title: my League of legends patcher turned white!!
body: My league of legends patcher was about 90 percent and it turned white while i was watching youtube. I have been waiting for 6 hours for it to download. I don't want to re download it.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=IntelSnitch,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=ATYE8G7A,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-03-26T07:40:45.213+0000)
>
> My league of legends patcher was about 90 percent and it turned white while i was watching youtube. I have been waiting for 6 hours for it to download. I don&#039;t want to re download it.

Never mind i fixed it but now it is downloading something else lmao. Its finally almost finished.

Glad to hear it started working again! Sucks you still had another patch though. {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}} 

You'll be back in the game soon! Watch out for that new Galio ;-)
